ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Rasbora heteromorpha (Harlequin fish) 10 mg/l/48 hr /Conditions of bioassay not specified/
LC50 Cyprinodon variegatus (Sheepshead minnow) 18 mg/l/48 hr /Conditions of bioassay not specified/

LC50 Gammarus fasciatus 2.0 mg/l/96 hr @ 15 °C, mature. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material 100%/

LC50 Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow) 16.3 mg/l/96 hr @ 18 °C (95% confidence interval 14.2-18.0 mg/l), wt 0.9 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material 100%/

LC50 Ictaturus punctatus (Channel catfish)17.4 mg/l/96 hr @ 18 °C (95% confidence interval 12.2-24.8 mg/l), wt 1.6 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material 100%/

LC50 Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow) 17.5 mg/l/96 hr @ 18 °C (95% confidence interval 15.7-19.7 mg/l), wt 1.2 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Bladex dispersible liquid, 4 lb/gal)

LC50 Ictalurus punctatus (Channel catfish) 11.3 mg/l/96 hr @ 18 °C (95% confidence interval 9.9-12.9 mg/l), wt 1.6 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. (Bladex dispersible liquid, 4 lb/gal/

LC50 Salmo gairdneri (Rainbow trout) 9.0 mg/l/96 hr @ 13 °C (95% confidence interval 5.6-14.6 mg/l), wt 1.0 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Bladex wettable powder, 80%/

LC50 Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow) 21.3 mg/l/96 hr @ 18 °C (95% confidence interval 16.5-27.4 mg/l), wt 1.2 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Bladex wettable powder, 80%/

LC50 Ictalurus punctatus (Channel catfish) 10.4 mg/l/96 hr @ 18 °C (95% confidence interval 7.7-14.0 mg/l), wt 1.6 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Bladex wettable powder, 80%/

LC50 Lepomis macrochirus (Bluegill) 22.5 mg/l/96 hr @ 18 °C, wt 1.1 g. Staticbioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Bladex wettable powder, 80%/
